participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

peq_left_out_perp.Description: I left another kid out of an activity or conversation that they really wanted to be included in. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_left_out_vic.Description: Some kids left me out of an activity or conversation I really wanted to be included in. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_chase_perp.Description: I chased a kid like I was really trying to hurt him or her. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_chase_vic.Description: A kid chased me like he or she was really trying to hurt me. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_rumor_perp.Description: I tried to damage another kid's social reputation by spreading rumors about them. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_rumor_vic.Description: A kid tried to damage my social reputation by spreading rumors about me | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_invite_perp.Description: I did not invite a kid to a party or other social event even though I knew the kid wanted to go. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_invite_vic.Description: A kid did not invite me to a party or social event though they knew that I wanted to go. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_exclude_perp.Description: I left another kid out of what I was doing. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_exclude_vic.Description: A kid left me out of what they were doing. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_gossip_perp.Description: I gossiped about another kid so others would not like him/her. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_gossip_vic.Description: Another kid gossiped about me so others would not like me. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_threat_perp.Description: I threatened to hurt or beat up another kid. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_threat_vic.Description: A kid threatened to hurt or beat me up. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_loser_perp.Description: I said mean things about a kid so that people would think s/he was a loser. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_loser_vic.Description: Another kid said mean things about me so that people would think I was a loser. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_hit_perp.Description: I hit, kicked, or pushed another kid in a mean way. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_hit_vic.Description: A kid hit, kicked, or pushed me in a mean way. | 1=Never; 2=Once or twice; 3=A few times; 4=About once a week; 5=A few times a week

peq_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event_name_number] > '21'

peq_ss_relational_aggs_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Relational Aggression Number Missing

peq_ss_relational_victim.Description: Peer Experiences: Relational Victimization Summary Score; sum(peq_left_out_vic,peq_invite_vic, peq_exclude_vic); Validation: All items must be answered

peq_ss_relational_victim_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Relational Victimization Number Missing

peq_ss_relational_victim_nt.Description: Peer Experiences: Relational Victimization Number Total

peq_ss_reputation_aggs.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Aggression Summary Score; sum(peq_rumor_perp, peq_gossip_perp, peq_loser_perp); Validation: All items must be answered

peq_ss_reputation_aggs_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Aggression Number Missing

peq_ss_reputation_aggs_nt.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Aggression Number Total

peq_ss_reputation_victim.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Victimization Summary Score; sum(peq_rumor_vic, peq_gossip_vic, peq_loser_vic); Validation: All items must be answered

peq_ss_reputation_victim_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Victimization Number Missing

peq_ss_reputation_victim_nt.Description: Peer Experiences: Reputational Victimization Number Total

peq_ss_overt_aggression.Description: Overt Aggression Summary Score; sum (peq_chase_perp, peq_threat_perp, peq_hit_perp); Validation: All items must be answered

peq_ss_overt_aggression_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Overt Aggression Number Missing

peq_ss_overt_aggression_nt.Description: Peer Experiences: Overt Aggression Number Total

peq_ss_overt_victim.Description: Peer Experiences: Overt Victimization Summary Score; sum(peq_chase_vic, peq_threat_vic, peq_hit_vic); Validation: All items must be answered

peq_ss_overt_victim_nm.Description: Peer Experiences: Overt Victimization Number Missing

peq_ss_overt_victim_nt.Description: Peer Experiences: Overt Victimization Number Total

peq_ss_relational_aggs.Description: Peer Experiences: Relational Aggression Summary Score; sum(peq_left_out_perp, peq_invite_perp, peq_exclude_perp); Validation: All items must be answered
